Page title: My 2st Blog

Layout author: Rong

Blog author: Rong

Blogs Navigation:

  • My 3rd Blog
  • My 2st Blog
  • My 1st Blog
  • Welcome to our site!!

    • Content:

    1. use the following commends to build up my website on git-page

       git init
 git checkout -b gh-pages
 git status
 git add .
 git commit -m "init commit"

 git remote add origin https://github.com/xiaorong117/Team_blog.git
 git push origin gh-pages

    2. use the following commends to update my website on git-page

       git status
 git add .
 git commit -m "init commit"
 git push origin gh-pages

    3. the site is as follows: https://xiaorong117.github.io/Team_blog/

    4. use the following commends to see my local website

        bundle exec jekyll serve

    5. _config.yml

      • default settings for posts and image

          defaults:
      - scope:
          path: ""
          type: "posts"
      values: 
          layout: "post"
          categories: "my-blogs"
          permalink: /:categories/:day/:month/:year/:title.html
      - scope:
          path: "assets/img"
      values:
          image: true

      • baseurl: “/Team_blog” # the subpath of your site, e.g. /blog
